definitions.definition: A pressing ; a force applied to a surface .
examples: Apply pressure to the wound to stop the bleeding.

definitions.definition: A contrasting force or impulse of any kind
examples: the pressure of poverty; the pressure of taxes; the pressure of motives on the mind; the pressure of civilization.
She has felt pressure lately because her boss expects her to get the job done by the first.

definitions.definition: The amount of force that is applied over a given area divided by the size of this area; force per unit area.

main_definition: A pressing ; a force applied to a surface .
secondary_definitions: A contrasting force or impulse of any kind
( physics ) The amount of force that is applied over a given area divided by the size of this area; force per unit area.
